original_text: But the men put forth their hand, and pulled Lot into the house to them, and shut to the door.
korean_text: 그 사람들이 손을 내밀어 롯을 집으로 끌어들이고 문을 닫고

sentences.original_text: But the men put forth their hand
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 사람들은 그들의 손을 내밀었고

sentences.original_text: and pulled Lot into the house to them
